title: PBE- Something went wrong
body:
I've tried to creat PBE acc (i have honor 5 and haven't been banned in near past) and I'm stucked on this page: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/345130636299730946/369113579401510922/unknown.png
no matter what I do to log in it displays the message "**Something went wrong. Please refresh the page and try again.**" Any1 knows what to do ?

replies.body: We've seen quite a few of these errors since the new PBE signups launched. Mostly it's due to that page simply being overloaded from how many people are trying to signup at once. Give it a couple hours and try again when the traffic has died down, but go ahead and try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if that helps as well.

Hey thanks for the update, tried again at 5am GMT... in incognito and it seems I get the exact same error :/ I really feel like this is linked to my account because I have yet to see any other error such as "name taken" since I started seeing this error after my first few "name taken" I got when trying out a few names. I made a ticket #32178034 if that's of any help
I got this same issue :/ though it worked for me at first while I was trying different names "name taken" but after 5 tries it gave me this error for everything
same here, dont know what to do :/
i have same problems after few names taken. does anyone succesfully registered maybe after some time passed
I'm having the same issue, have been trying every hour to sign up but keep getting this message.
